item.title: Would this command be right?
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[quote=“legend the hero, post:7, topic:252625”]you might as well do just player rights 3 so like this…

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“zezimapk”) && playerRights >= 3) {

addItem(7449, 1);
addItem(15345, 1);
addItem(6585, 1);
addItem(15348, 1);
addItem(15185, 1);
addItem(15350, 1);
addItem(6570, 1);
addItem(7462, 1);
addItem(6735, 1);
    }[/code][/quote]

using that means that ALL admins can use that , so sometimes its better u make a command only owner end co owner can use becaus server like he has have like 1000 mods end 500 admins

Read full topic

item.title: Would this command be right?

item.description:
@wiz1166 wrote:

You need to get a command maker and put what u want in it like that but you will find out what to do when u see the command maker, then when u make it go down to all of ur server commands and then make a space in between them or the starting script code and past the code there and then after that you need to compile it and make sure there is no errors in it and if ur compiler dont work come here:
http://uppit.com/8F5RAX and then download that and it should all be in good order
